meteringrange: EV 1-20 (at 73Â°F/23Â°C with EF 50mm f/1.4 USM lens, ISO 100)
shutterspeeds: 1/8000 to 1/60 sec., X-sync at 1/250 sec. 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
exposurecompensation: Manual: Â±5 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments (can be combined with AEB)
imagetype: Still: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon original), sRAW, mRAW, RAW+JPEG Video: MOV (Image data: H.264, Audio: Linear PCM)
drivemodes: Single, High-speed continuous, Low-speed continuous and Self-timer (10-sec. or 2-sec. delay)
picturestyle: Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Def. 1-3
compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx.1.6x the lens focal length)
afpointselection: (1) Manual selection: Single point AF (2) Manual selection: Spot AF (3) Manual selection: AF point expansion (4) Manual selection: Zone AF (5) Automatic selection: 19 point AF
viewfindermirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60)
recordingfunctions: Images              record directly to the CF card. With the WFT-E5A attached, image              recording to the CF card and to the USB external media connected to the              WFT-E5A will be possible as follows (1) Standard (2) Automatic              switching of recording media(3) Separate recording (4) Recording of              identical images (5) Backup to external recording media
exposurecontrol: Program AE              (Shiftable), Shutter-priority AE, Aperture-priority AE, Creative Auto,              Full auto, Manual exposure, E-TTL II autoflash program AE
afassistbeam: When an external              EOS-dedicated Speedlite is attached to the camera, the AF-assist beam              from the Speedlite will be emitted when necessary
isospeedrecommendedexposureindex: Automatically set, ISO 100-6400 (in 1/3-stop or 1-stop increments) Basic Zone modes: ISO 100-3200 set automatically Extension settable (with C.Fn.I 3-1): ISO 12800 High Tone Priority settable: ISO 200-6400
aelock: Auto: Applied in One-Shot AF mode with evaluative metering when focus is achieved Manual: By AE lock button
colortemperaturecompensation: White balance correction: Â±9 stops in 5 step increments White balance bracketing: Â±3 stops in full-stop increments Blue/amber direction or magenta/green direction possible
imageprotect: Single images can be erase-protected or not
imagesensortype: High-sensitivity, high-resolution, large single-plate CMOS sensor
camerausersettings: Register under Mode Dial's C1 and C3 positions
powersaving: Provided; Power turns off after 1, 2, 4, 8, 15 or 30 min.
interfacelanguages: 25              (English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian,              Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Greek, Russian, Polish, Czech, Hungarian,              Romanian,Ukraine, Turkish, Arabic, Thai, Simplified/Traditional              Chinese, Korean, Japanese)
battery: One Battery Pack LP-E6 AC power can be supplied via AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6 with Battery Grip BG-E6 attached
compatibleimages: JPEG and RAW images Only JPEG images can be transferred as wallpaper on the personal computer screen
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I              and II, UDMA-compliant CF cards, via external media (USB v.2.0 hard              drive, via optional Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E5)
size: (1) Large: Approx. 17.90 Megapixels (5,184 x 3,456) (2) Medium: Approx. 8.00 Megapixels (3,456 x 2,304) (3) Small: Approx. 4.50 Megapixels (2,592 x 1,728) (4) RAW: Approx. 17.90 Megapixels (5,184 x 3,456) (5) M-RAW: Approx. 10.10 Megapixels (3,888 x 2,592) (6) S-RAW: Approx. 4.50 Megapixels (2,592 x 1,728) Exact file sizes depend on the subject, ISO speed, Picture Style, etc.
recordingformat: Design rule for Camera File System 2.0 and Exif 2.21
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset, manual reset Possible to create new folders and select folders in the CF card
focusing: Quick mode (Phase-difference detection) Live mode/Face Detection Live mode (Contrast detection) Manual focusing (5x/10x magnification possible)
dustdeletionfeature: (1) Automatic sensor cleaning (2) Manual cleaning of sensor (3) Dust Delete Data appended to the captured image
afpoints: 19-point all cross-type AF (f/2.8 at center: Dual Cross Sensor)
focusingmodes: Auto, One-Shot AF, Predictive AI Servo AF, AI Focus AF, Manual focusing (MF)
usbterminal: For personal computer communication and direct printing (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image sensor
selectedafpointdisplay: Indicated by transmissive LCD display in the viewfinder and on the LCD panel
videooutterminal: (1) Video OUT terminal: NTSC/PAL selectable (2) HDMI mini OUT terminal
meteringmodes: Evaluative metering with the image sensor (still photos) Center-weighted average metering (video)
printableimages: JPEG images              compliant to Design rule for Camera File System (DPOF printing              possible) and RAW/sRAW images captured with the EOS 5D Mark II
imageplaybackdisplayformat: Single              image, Single image + Image-recording quality/shooting information,              histogram, 4- or 9-image index, magnified view (approx. 1.5x-10x),              rotated image(auto/manual), image jump (by 10/100 images, index screen,              by shooting date, by folder), slide show (all images/selected by              date/folder)
continuousshootingspeed: High-speed: Max. 8.0 shots/sec Low-speed: Max. 3.0 shots/sec
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the CMOS sensor
imageerase: Single image, check-marked images or all images in the CF card can be erased (except protected images)
viewfinderinformation: AF              information (AF points, focus confirmation light), Exposure information              (Shutter speed, aperture, ISO speed, AE lock, exposure level, spot              metering circle, exposure warning), Flash information (Flash ready,              flash exposure compensation, high-speed sync, FE lock, red-eye              reduction light), Image information (Highlight tone priority,              Monochrome shooting, maximum burst, white balance correction, CF card              information), Composition information (Grid, electronic level), Battery              Check
maximumburst: JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 94 (CF)/approx. 126 (UDMA CF) RAW: approx. 15/approx. 15 (UDMA CF) RAW+JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 6 (CF/UDMA CF) Based on Canon's testing standards with a 2GB CF card, high-speed continuous shooting, ISO 100 and Standard Picture Style
